Job description:
Company Overview
One of the largest global conglomerates ’ system integrator is looking for a Software Developer/ Engineer to work on the maintenance phase of projects for clients in the Financial services sector.
Job Responsibilities
 Gather, analyse and formalise user’s business requirements and processes, evaluate on feasibility of implementation and manage project scope.  Prepare project documentation such as Requirement Specifications to meet customers’ requirements and conforms to quality management process standards and procedures to minimise rework.  Adhere to project scope, update requirement traceability matrix, inform and record out-of-scope issues.  Develop technical design specification. Involve in the design review session.  Set up and Make changes to configurable items which include hardware, server, software, documentation, etc.  Participate in Coding and Code Review.  Assist in the integration testing, system testing, User Acceptance Test (UAT) & implementation activities.  Prepare user manual and operations manual and facilitate training of users and operators in using the system.  Provide post implementation support including production support and service requests.  Discuss and escalate critical issues such as scope creep with the relevant managers.  Conduct requirement gathering sessions and gap analysis of current business process to identify improvement opportunities.  Have clear and open communication with customers on project issues or clarifications  Track the progress and provide updates to Project Manager  Resolve problems promptly and provide effective solution  Manage and perform the ad hoc tasks in timely manner 

Job Requirements
 5-10 years of relevant experience in software development and SDLC Familiar with Banking domains such as Loan, Trade, Market areas Experience with Financial domain projects Experienced in Java and Spring Framework/ Low Code Development. Ability to lead, develop and maintain good relationship with customers.

Benefits
Package: Depends on your experience (base + AWS + competitive variable bonus)
Working Location: Singapore (City)
Apply online or feel free to contact me directly for more information about this opportunity. Due to the high volume of applicants, we regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Thank you for your understanding.
*Candidates need visa need not apply*
Oba Nana (R1988153)
JAC Recruitment Pte Ltd (EA Lic No: 90C3026)
#countrysingapore

Job Title: Specialist, Display Solutions - Advertising and Partnerships (APAC)
Job description:
‘Bringing convenience to your everyday’ - that’s our mission at foodpanda (small ‘f’). So whether it’s by delivering food on our signature pink bikes, providing insights into the newest food trends, or getting you the groceries you need, we’re all about keeping you fed. As we move to grow throughout the Asia-Pacific region, we are on the lookout for talent who are excited about making a tangible impact with a fast-growing organization looking to redefine how food, people, culture, and technology are connected.

We are now looking for a highly driven and motivated Specialist, Display Solutions - Advertising and Partnerships to join our fast-growing regional headquarters base in Singapore as an individual contributor. The successful candidate will be a key member of our Solutions team within the Advertising and Partnerships (APAC) org; you'll be our thought leader and bring Display media solutions to life, working with product, operations and regional partnerships teams.

Key Responsibilities
 Own the product strategy for Display in APAC, encompassing key topics such as new formats, serving capabilities, attribution, measurement and targeting  Drive the Go-To-Market strategy together with regional sales leaders, and be responsible for metrics such as adoption, fill rate and yield of Display solutions  Build strategic partnerships across the AdTech ecosystem, including with DSPs, SSPs, DMPs and other exchanges/platforms  Oversee the continuing adoption and growth of your products, in collaboration with sales and partnerships leaders across our markets 
Key Requirements
 2-5 years of overall experience in AdTech-related roles  Passionate and excited about adtech, q-commerce and/or product management  Takes ownership and strives to be independent in your work, given the right support  Able to communicate honestly and directly, and disagree productively  Background in fast-paced, startup/tech environments would be an advantage.  Fluency in English (our corporate language) and great communication skills. 
foodpanda is the world’s favourite way to order food online to your home or office. Whether it’s getting your hands on your favourite pasta, kebab or pizza, we believe that no one should have to suffer from hunger attacks ever again!

Our parent company, Delivery Hero, is a global leader in the food delivery industry processing over 3 million orders every day and operating in 40+ markets in the world, with 18,000 employees and approximately 500,000+ restaurant partners. In APAC, foodpanda operates in over 150 cities across 12 countries.
Skills: Ad Tech:Attribution:Communication:Defining Requirements:Go-to-Market Strategy:Marketing Strategy:Media Solutions:Presales:Product Strategy:Workable Solutions
